title: BlueScope Steel Shares Surge After $8.8 Billion Takeover Bid
description: BlueScope Steel Ltd. shares surged in Sydney, after the company said it was considering a A$13.2 billion ($8.8 billion) takeover bid by US steelmaker Steel Dynamics Inc. and Australian conglomerate SGH Ltd.
content: BlueScope Steel Ltd. shares surged in Sydney, after the company said it was considering a A$13.2 billion ($8.8 billion) takeover bid by US steelmaker Steel Dynamics Inc. and Australian conglomerate SGH Ltd.
